## Description {#details}

Class representing a single binary operation in the AST of an expression.

## Public Member Functions

### eval() {#ae881b7ad9c843880674599dbe5d85dd9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; APInt &gt; BinaryOperation::eval () const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Evaluates the value of the binary operation represented by this AST, using EvalBinop on the result of recursively evaluating the operands.

<SectionUser title="Returns">
the expression value or an error if an undefined numeric variable is used in one of the operands.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheckimpl-h/#l00326">326</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheckimpl-h">FileCheckImpl.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheck-cpp/#l00203">203</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheck-cpp">FileCheck.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getImplicitFormat() {#a24d9325add2b388eebc0420cf6a0fdb4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; ExpressionFormat &gt; BinaryOperation::getImplicitFormat (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sourcemgr">SourceMgr</a> &amp; SM) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
the implicit format of this AST, if any, a diagnostic against <code>SM</code> if the implicit formats of the AST&#39;s components conflict, or no format if the AST has no implicit format (e.g. AST is made of a single literal).
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheckimpl-h/#l00333">333</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheckimpl-h">FileCheckImpl.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheck-cpp/#l00242">242</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/filecheck/filecheck-cpp">FileCheck.cpp</a>.
